name:
AN OAK TREE LATE IN WINTER
book
normally $14.95
description: Promotions One book only 174 pages Save $2.95 Each chapter of An Oak Tree Late in Winter tells the narrative behind one of the songs Josh has written. In 2009, Josh released phase one of the Villages Suite, four albums in four months. This book is phase two. Because phase one alone incompletely communicated what he wanted to say, in an attempt to speak outside of his typical outlets, Josh chose the art of narrative to show God's ability to redeem even the most seemingly irredeemable memories. If you have any questions or concerns about your order, please email us at JoshRosenthalMusic@gmail.com
